title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.105 - Fair market value
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.105 - Fair market value

State Regulations

The price for which an asset would be purchased in an
arm's-length transaction as a result of good-faith bargaining between a
sophisticated buyer and seller, neither being under any compulsion to buy or
sell. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.105

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
